lead_paragraph: Although warned that charming columnist Mark Forman is a womanizer, successful food critic Rachel Samstat marries him. When Rachel become pregnant, Mark is frightened by his new responsibility and begins cheating on her.
snippet: Although warned that charming columnist Mark Forman is a womanizer, successful food critic Rachel Samstat marries him. When Rachel become pregnant, Mark is frightened by his new responsibility and begins cheating on her.
